title: Use smiley images instead of font glyphs.
message:
Use smiley images instead of font glyphs.

Fucking fonts are unpredictable. Obviously related characters are wildy
different sizes (in the same typeface and point size) and positioned
differently in the "frame". And on iOS the smiley is emoticonized and the frown
is not. Font fail!

title: Did some score analysis, adjusted hand scores.
message:
Did some score analysis, adjusted hand scores.

Basically I had the AI play a bunch of games against one another, ranking hands
by length (more cards is better). I used the hand frequencies there to come up
with a first pass at scoring, then I reran the AI using those score values to
see if it was stable (i.e. pretty close to the "rank by hand length" values).
From there I tweaked things a smidgen more.
